attributes.review: I downloaded this app and suddenly I only see a racist orange on my screen. I’m pretty sure it’s a glitch. Need to get that sorted out before it cracks my screen and burns my corneas.
attributes.title: Difficult to use

attributes.review: I got this app 3 days ago, it drains battery, constantly glitches and won’t even open half the time!
attributes.title: Will break your phone!

attributes.review: Never had to deal with such a frustrating app. It’s literally the antichrist. Do not recommend. Def has some hateful vibes. Told me to tell my mom she was ugly and to kill herself. Didn’t go well.
attributes.title: This app is the worst.

attributes.review: Wouldn’t recommend, doesn’t load right away and always crashes. I miss how the app use to be Make this app great again
attributes.title: Make this app great again

attributes.review: The worst app I’ve downloaded. Very slow and glitchy but much love for my wonderful orange boi. Definitely no alternative motive for this rating but sheer disappointment in its quality and function.

attributes.review: Honestly I downloaded this app and it kept glitching and messing up and it’s honestly a very horrible app in all so I definitely don’t recommend getting it.
